ABOUT ACUSA

We are the

ABOUT US

Welcome to the dynamic world of ACUSA Media, where we harness the power of storytelling and multimedia to capture the essence of our university community. As the media hub of Ajayi Crowther University, we are committed to fostering communication, engagement, and creativity among students, faculty, and the broader community.

WHAT WE DO

News Coverage

We bring you timely and relevant news stories that reflect the vibrant happenings on and off-campus. Stay informed about campus events, achievements, and noteworthy developments.

Our News
Podcasts

Tune in to our engaging podcasts that cover a spectrum of topics, from academic insights to personal narratives. Listen to thought-provoking discussions and interviews that bring the university experience to life.

Our Podcasts
Feature Stories & Articles

Dive deeper into the heart of Ajayi Crowther University through our feature stories. Explore the diverse backgrounds, experiences, and journeys of our students, faculty, and alumni.

Our Articles
Photography

Our skilled photographers capture the moments that define Ajayi Crowther University. Browse through galleries that encapsulate the spirit of campus life, academic pursuits, and community engagement.

Our Gallery

OUR MISSION

At ACUSA Media, our mission is to amplify the voices, stories, and achievements that shape our university's identity. Through a variety of media channels, we aim to provide an inclusive platform for expression, dialogue, and exploration.

Meet Our Team

Our dedicated team of journalists, writers, editors, photographers, and creatives work collaboratively to bring you high-quality content that reflects the diversity and richness of the Ajayi Crowther University experience.

Join Us

Are you passionate about storytelling, media production, or journalism? Consider joining our team! Visit our Join us page for information on how to become a contributor or get involved in ACUSA Media.

Thank you for exploring ACUSA Media. We invite you to connect, engage, and be a part of the vibrant narratives that shape our university community.

Join us

CONNECT WITH US

Stay updated on our activities, events, and opportunities to get involved by following us on social media or contacting us directly.
